page.title: 07ROYAL EVENT CONTINUED
page.content:
WE WERE AWAITING THEIR RETURN GUN SALUTES, WHICH WERE FIRED IN HYDE PARK BY THE KINGS TROOP ROYAL HORSE ARTILLERY.
SOON THE ROYAL COACHES BEGAN TO ARRIVE, PRECEEDED BY MARCHING BANDS PLAYING THE ANTHEM. THE OPEN COACHES WERE FABULOUSLY DECORATED AND WERE PULLED BY PERFECTLY GROOMED HORSES AND ATTENDED BY FOOTMEN WEARING LONG PURPLE COATS AND WHITE WIGS. IN THE COACHES ARRIVING WERE THE QUEEN, PRINCE PHILIP, THE PRESIDENT OF MEXICO AND OTHER MEMBERS OF THE ROYAL FAMILY. AFTER THEY HAD ARRIVED, THE QUEEN INVESTED THE PRESIDENT OF MEXICO WITH THE INSIGNIA OF A KNIGHT GRAND CROSS OF THE MOST HONOURABLE ORDER OF THE BATH.
